info.title: MIRADOR-CORE API
info.description: Mirador Core is a comprehensive observability and analytics platform that provides KPI definitions, layouts, dashboards, user preferences, metrics, logs, traces, and RBAC management for monitoring and analyzing system metrics.

get.description: Check the health status of the service
Check if the service is ready to handle requests
Get the status of all microservices
Get Prometheus metrics for monitoring

post.description: Authenticate a user with username and password, returns session token and API key

500.description: Session creation failed or API key generation failed

post.description: Invalidate the current user session
Validate a session token, API key, or JWT token and return user information

get.description: Retrieve all API keys for the authenticated user

post.description: Create a new API key for the authenticated user with specified name, description, and scopes

400.description: Invalid request format or API key limit exceeded

500.description: Failed to generate or create API key

delete.description: Deactivate an API key by its ID

get.description: Retrieve the current API key limits and configuration

put.description: Update API key limits (requires admin role)

403.description: Insufficient permissions or updates disabled by configuration

get.description: Retrieve the current API key configuration (global admin only)
Retrieve all roles

post.description: Create a new role

get.description: Get roles assigned to a user
Retrieve all permissions

post.description: Create a new permission

get.description: Retrieve all groups

post.description: Create a new group

get.description: Get members of a group
Retrieve all role bindings

post.description: Create a new role binding

get.description: Retrieve a paginated list of KPI definitions with optional filtering by tags

post.description: Create a new KPI definition or update an existing one. If ID is not provided, a new UUID will be generated.

delete.description: Delete a KPI definition by its ID. Requires confirmation via query parameter.

get.description: Retrieve the layout configuration for all KPIs in a specific dashboard

post.description: Update the layout configuration for multiple KPIs in a dashboard

get.description: Retrieve a paginated list of dashboards

post.description: Create a new dashboard. If ID is not provided, a new UUID will be generated.

put.description: Update an existing dashboard by ID

delete.description: Delete a dashboard by its ID. Cannot delete the default dashboard. Requires confirmation.

400.description: Missing id, cannot delete default dashboard, or confirmation required

post.description: Execute a PromQL query against VictoriaMetrics
Execute a PromQL range query against VictoriaMetrics

get.description: Get available metric names from VictoriaMetrics
Get time series data for metrics

post.description: Get label names and values from VictoriaMetrics

get.description: Get values for a specific label

post.description: Execute a LogsQL query against VictoriaLogs

get.description: Get available log streams from VictoriaLogs
Get available log fields from VictoriaLogs

post.description: Export logs based on query
Store a JSON log event in VictoriaLogs (for AI engines)

get.description: Get histogram data for logs over time
Get facet data for logs

post.description: Search logs with advanced filtering

get.description: Stream live logs via WebSocket
Get list of services from traces
Get operations for a specific service
Get a specific trace by ID
Get flamegraph data for a trace

post.description: Search traces with filters
Search traces and return flamegraph data

get.description: Get list of active correlations from RCA engine

post.description: Start an RCA investigation for a service or component

get.description: Get known failure patterns from RCA engine

post.description: Generate service dependency graph for RCA analysis
Store a correlation result back to VictoriaLogs

get.description: Get configured data sources

post.description: Add a new data source configuration

get.description: Get configured integrations
Get user preferences and UI state

post.description: Create user preferences

get.description: Get runtime feature flags

post.description: Reset feature flags to defaults

get.description: Get configured gRPC endpoints

post.description: Reset gRPC endpoints to defaults

get.description: Get list of active user sessions

post.description: Invalidate a user session

get.description: Get sessions for a specific user
Get RBAC audit events
Get a specific audit event by ID
Get summary statistics for audit events
Get audit events for a specific subject
List all users (global admin only)

post.description: Create a new user (global admin only)

get.description: Get user details (global admin only)

post.description: Create local authentication credentials (global admin only)

get.description: Get local authentication credentials (global admin only)

put.description: Update local authentication credentials (global admin only)

delete.description: Delete local authentication credentials (global admin only)

post.description: Create authentication configuration (admin only)

get.description: Get authentication configuration (admin only)
WebSocket stream for real-time metrics data
WebSocket stream for real-time alerts

post.description: Execute a unified query across metrics, logs, and traces
Execute correlation analysis across multiple data sources

get.description: Get metadata about available unified query capabilities
Check health of unified query engine

post.description: Search across all data sources

get.description: Get statistics about unified query usage

post.description: Execute a query using Unified Query Language
Validate a UQL query syntax and semantics
Get execution plan for a UQL query
Search for metrics metadata using Bleve
Trigger manual sync of metrics metadata

get.description: Check health of metrics metadata system

ApiKeyAuth.name: X-API-Key
ApiKeyAuth.description: API key for authentication. API keys are generated via the API key endpoints.

BearerAuth.name: Authorization
BearerAuth.description: Type "Bearer" followed by a space and JWT token. Used for UI/web flows.
